name: Coconut Rice
keywords: jasmine rice, unsweetened coconut milk, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 cans unsweetened coconut milk, 3 to 4 cups

recipeInstructions.text: Combine coconut milk and rice in a saucepan, and bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Add some salt, reduce heat to low, and cover. Cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally to make sure the rice does not stick or burn.

Uncover, and continue to cook, stirring, over low heat until rice is tender and mixture is creamy. If liquid evaporates before rice is done, stir in water, about 1/2 cup at a time, and cook until done.
